articles.title: Toyota LandCruiser 300 Series Hybrid confirmed for Australia
articles.author: Damion Smy
articles.summary: Toyota will introduce the first performance hybrid LandCruiser next year. This new LandCruiser will offer a level of capability never before seen on their flagship four-wheel drive.

articles.title: Toyota LandCrusier Hybrid confirmed for Australia
articles.author: Damion Smy
articles.summary: Toyota plans to introduce the first performance hybrid LandCruiser next year. This new model will offer a level of capability not previously seen on their flagship four-wheel drive vehicle.

articles.title: Scoop: Mattel is still deciding what its first AI toy will be
articles.author: Ina Fried
articles.summary: Mattel is partnering with OpenAI to develop AI-powered products and experiences. Mattel is considering if its first AI product will be a toy or a digital experience and aims to reveal their first AI product this year. The initial product will not be targeted towards children under 13.

articles.title: Android 16 Brings Desktop Mode to Tablets, But Foldables Get Left Behind
articles.author: Jose Enrico
articles.summary: Google is introducing a new desktop mode on Android 16, aiming to compete with Samsung's DeX experience. This feature allows users to run apps in resizable windows and includes a taskbar for enhanced navigation and multitasking, similar to desktop operating systems like Windows or macOS. The feature will be available for tablets.

articles.title: Doubleverify launches DV Authentic Advantage offering
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: DoubleVerify (DV) launched DV Authentic AdVantage, a solution combining media quality controls with DV Scibids AI to enhance ad performance in walled garden environments. This new product aims to improve spend efficiency, scale reach, and achieve breakthrough performance by addressing challenges related to cost efficiency, media quality, and performance for advertisers. DV Authentic AdVantage is built on the DV Media AdVantage Platform (DV MAP), incorporating verification, AI-powered optimization, and outcome measurement capabilities.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland fans set to love new Ninja air fryer dupe in middle aisle and it costs just €99.99
articles.author: Emma Mooney
articles.summary: Lidl Ireland has launched a new 11L Dual Layer Air Fryer, available in stores from June 24th. The air fryer features two baskets with individual digital controls and racks for cooking up to four foods at once, and is offered as a more affordable alternative to the Ninja air fryer, with a price significantly lower than the Ninja's €270 price tag.

articles.title: Retro Looks, Modern Guts. Edifiers Speakers Tick All the Boxes.
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Edifier has launched a new ES-series of audio products, including the ES20, ES60, and ES300 speakers, and the ES850NB headphones. The ES20 is a compact 6W Bluetooth speaker with 15 hours of battery life and IP67 rating, while the ES60 is a more powerful 34W speaker with 9 hours of battery and IP66 rating. The ES300 is a 60W stationary speaker, and the ES850NB headphones offer active noise cancellation and up to 92 hours of battery life.

articles.title: /C O R R E C T I O N -- SAMBAZON/
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: SAMBAZON has launched a new line of pre-topped Açaí & Smoothie Bowls designed for consumer convenience.  The new line includes flavors like Açaí Berry Blend, Açaí Raspberry Blend, and Mango Dragon Fruit Blend and is currently available at Target, with plans to expand to Sprouts and Publix.

articles.title: SAMBAZON® Launches New Pre-Topped Açaí & Smoothie Bowls for Ultimate Convenience
articles.author: Sambazon
articles.summary: SAMBAZON is launching new Fruit & Granola Topped Smoothie & Açaí Bowls. The new pre-topped frozen açaí & smoothie bowls come in three flavors: Açaí Berry Blend, Açaí Raspberry Blend, and Mango Dragon Fruit Blend and is currently available at Target, followed by Sprouts, and Publix this summer.

articles.title: New to The Street Launches Arrive AI TV Commercials Across its Full Media Ecosystem
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: New to The Street launched a new national commercial campaign for Arrive AI (NASDAQ:ARAI). The commercial will air on CNBC, FOX Business, and Bloomberg, integrated into New to The Street's weekly TV series reaching over 220 million U.S. homes.

articles.title: New to The Street Launches Arrive AI TV Commercials Across its Full Media Ecosystem
articles.author: New To The Street
articles.summary: New to The Street is launching a national commercial campaign for Arrive AI's autonomous delivery platform, which includes smart mailbox technology. The campaign will air on CNBC, FOX Business, Bloomberg, and New to The Street's YouTube channel, aiming to increase visibility for Arrive AI as it commercializes and expands its product across healthcare, e-commerce, and temperature-sensitive logistics sectors.

articles.title: Oman: 'Raf' student platform enables easy creation of smart e-stores
articles.author: Oman News Agency
org: University of Technology and Applied Sciences
articles.summary: Raf, a startup from the University of Technology and Applied Sciences in Muscat, has developed an AI-powered e-commerce platform tailored for the Omani market. This platform, featuring automated store setup, price adjustments, and smart data analytics, aims to launch fully by early 2026.

articles.title: Ethical Web AI Hits Major Milestones in 2025 Growth Strategy  Jun. 12, 2025 21:19
articles.summary: Ethical Web AI has launched its new product, AI Vault, a secure, enterprise-grade generative AI platform, and onboarded its first AI Vault SaaS client via the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Marketplace. AI Vault is designed to address enterprise challenges in adopting generative AI related to transparency, security, and regulatory compliance and is backed by multiple USPTO patents.

articles.title: What matters most to Dad: the safety of his family, even when they're watching TV
articles.author: Criticologos
articles.summary: Samsung is promoting its QLED TVs, particularly the Neo QLED 8K and 4K models, highlighting their cadmium-free design and features aimed at home health and family well-being. The 2025 TVs include new features like Samsung Daily+, Pet Care, and Stingray Karaoke, providing enhanced functionality and a unique viewing experience.

articles.title: Super Star reveals what future car wash near South Bridge will look like
articles.author: David Iversen
articles.summary: Super Star Car Wash is planning to construct a new full-service car wash facility in Maricopa, Arizona, featuring an automated wash tunnel, three express pay stations, and 20 vacuum bays. The facility will be located on John Wayne Parkway and Honeycutt Avenue and is designed with textured concrete blocks, ribbed metal panels, and bold red canopies. The company expects to add a needed service to the area.

articles.title: The Best Shampoos For Oily Hair That Leave It Bouncy And Shiny
articles.author: Molly Calhoun
articles.summary: Ouai introduced Detox Shampoo containing apple cider vinegar and chelating agents, designed to purify strands and remove minerals. K18 launched Peptide Prep Detox Shampoo, formulated with charcoal and salicylic acid to eliminate oils and sebum. Jupiter offers Balancing Shampoo And Nourishing Conditioner with zinc pyrithione, while Cécred provides Clarifying Shampoo and Salt Scrub featuring purple willow bark and tea tree oil for exfoliation.

articles.title: Samsung teases a smarter, AI-powered camera on its thinnest foldable yet
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7, emphasizing its thinner, lighter design and AI-powered camera features. The new foldable phone aims to provide a smarter camera experience, potentially integrating AI functionalities directly into the camera app for tasks like translation and information retrieval, coupled with privacy considerations. The launch is expected to occur next month.

articles.title: Discover first-in-Singapore eateries and IG-worthy zones at this retail hotspot
articles.summary: City Square Mall has introduced new eateries and retail concepts after an extensive renovation. The mall welcomes first-in-Singapore brands like The Fat Sparrow, Daydream Desserts, Xiao Jiao Tian Sichuan Cuisine, and @ i Mango, and established brands like Haidilao with Hi Hot Pot, and Popular Bookstore with Popular Pals. The mall also features interactive community spaces and Playwalls.

articles.title: Being Stuck Is A Major Enterprise Risk: Maze + Shopify Offer the Way Out
articles.author: Maze
articles.summary: Maze is launching a Shopify migration campaign. This campaign aims to help enterprises escape legacy commerce systems and scale quickly. The campaign encourages businesses to '#GetUnstuck'.

articles.title: First Neue Klasse Model: BMW iX3 Brings Bold EV Innovation
articles.author: Jacob Oliva
articles.summary: BMW is launching the iX3, its first production Neue Klasse model, in Germany this fall. The iX3 features an 800V architecture, new cylindrical cell batteries providing up to 497 miles of range, and a Gen6 powertrain for improved performance. BMW is also introducing bidirectional charging with the iX3, supporting Vehicle-to-Load (V2L), Vehicle-to-Home (V2H), and Vehicle-to-Grid (V2G) capabilities.

articles.title: Amazon wants sellers to use its AI generator to make ads
articles.summary: Amazon has released Amazon Ads' Video Generator, an AI-powered tool that enables U.S. sellers to easily create video advertisements for their products. This free tool, previously in beta, can generate up to six short videos within minutes, aiding sellers in marketing their products on Amazon.

articles.title: Zoom unveils Virtual Agent 2.0 to power smarter, autonomous customer support via next-gen agentic AI
articles.author: Canoe
articles.summary: Zoom Communications introduced Zoom Virtual Agent 2.0, a self-service virtual agent powered by agentic AI. This new generation aims to provide intelligent and proactive customer support, focusing on building connections between customers and brands.

articles.title: This week in beauty: Sales on sunscreen, fragrance and more
articles.author: Claire Peltier
articles.summary: Bliss launched Bright Idea Brightening Toner Pads and Clear Genius Clarifying Gel Moisturizer. Sol de Janeiro introduced Body Badalada Vitamin Infused Lotion. Violette_FR launched Lip Nectar Hydrating Lip Stain. Lake & Skye debuted The Numerology Collection of hair and body mists. Ouai dropped Super Dry Shampoo. Saint Crewe launched a skin care line. Merit launched The Uniform tinted sunscreen. Florence by Mills launched Love Core hair and body mist. Keys Soulcare is promoting its skin and body care line.

articles.title: Taco Bell unveils surprising new menu items that threaten McDonald's
articles.author: Fernanda Tronco
articles.summary: Taco Bell, owned by Yum! Brands, is launching new Crispy Chicken Tacos and Burritos featuring Crispy Chicken Strips, available from June 17 for a limited time. The launch also includes two new dipping sauces: Spicy Ranchero and Avocado Ranch. Taco Bell plans to make Crispy Chicken a permanent menu item by 2026.

articles.title: T-Mobile Samsung Galaxy deal: How to get a free Samsung Galaxy S25 Plus
articles.author: Joseph Green
articles.summary: T-Mobile is offering a free Samsung Galaxy S25 Plus to customers who trade in any phone. This offer is available through T-Mobile's Experience Beyond or Go5G Next plans, starting June 11.

articles.title: Secret Scope Camera Reviews 2025: Is This AI Surveillance Camera Worth Purchasing? (Reddit & Amazon Reviews)
articles.author: SAT Articles
articles.summary: Secret Scope Camera, an AI-powered security camera with features such as real-time alerts, remote viewing, and 1080p HD video, has been launched. It includes AI-powered motion detection and night vision, and can be accessed via a mobile app. The camera has a compact design and is suitable for both indoor and outdoor use, with a price of $34.99 (50% OFF).

articles.title: Clear Skin Essentials: Top Cleansers to Shop During Myntra's EORS
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser, CeraVe Hydrating Facial Cleanser, Simple Refreshing Face Wash, and Minimalist Face Wash are highlighted as skincare products available during Myntra's End of Reason Sale (May 31–June 12). Each face wash caters to different skin types and offers unique benefits, such as hydration, gentle cleansing, or exfoliation.

articles.title: Next shoppers praise 'comfortable and good value' summer dress that's under €35
articles.author: Aine Kenny
articles.summary: Next introduced the Cobalt Blue Jersey Midi Summer Dress, priced at €31.50 and available in sizes 6-22 and various colors. The dress features a comfortable cotton-blend jersey fabric and received positive customer reviews. River Island also offers a similar dress, the Blue Sleeveless Cut Out Printed Mini Dress.

articles.title: CC Cream Steals at Myntra's End of Reason Sale
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Lakme promotes its 9 to 5 CC Cream for light to medium skin, offering a soft, matte look. Spawake's Complete Complexion CC Cream, with SPF 32/PA++, targets dry, medium to dark complexions. Faces Canada CC Cream provides moderate coverage for light to medium skin types, while ME-ON CC Cream aims to brighten and cover imperfections for medium to dark skin.

articles.title: Best Laptop Deal of the Day: $565 Off the Lenovo Legion Slim 5 for Gamers
articles.author: Jade Chung-Lee
articles.summary: Lenovo has launched the Legion Slim Gen 9 gaming laptop featuring a faster 14th Gen Intel i7-14650HX processor while maintaining the praised design and display of the Gen 8 model. The new laptop includes three months of Xbox PC Game Pass and is available at a promotional price with discounts at Amazon, Newegg, and Walmart.

articles.title: St Andrews Links unveils brand refresh
articles.author: Golf Business News
articles.summary: St Andrews Links introduced an updated brand identity. This represents the launch of a refreshed brand offering from the company.

articles.title: The Most Refreshing Drop of the Summer: Olay and Secret Debut Limited Edition Summer Fizz ...
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Procter & Gamble's Olay and Secret brands are launching a limited-edition Summer Fizz Scent.

articles.title: 123Invent Inventor Develops New Platform for Cleaning the Litter Box (PLB-554)
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: An inventor has developed LIFTING LITTER, a new platform designed to simplify litter box cleaning by eliminating bending and straining. The adjustable platform is available for licensing or sale to manufacturers and marketers.

articles.title: Fuzzy's Taco Shop Pilots New Hospitality-Driven Model in Sugar Land, TX
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Fuzzy's Taco Shop opened its newest location, Fuzzy's Tacos and Margs, in Sugar Land, Texas, on June 16, 2025. The new restaurant introduces a refreshed dining experience featuring full-service hospitality, digital innovations, and a revamped menu. The location will feature enhanced menu options and dining experiences.

articles.title: TikTok Rolls Out New Badges to Highlight Seller Performance
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: TikTok has launched an expanded badge system to highlight reputable sellers. The badges, including 'Official Shop,' 'Authorized Seller,' 'Gold Star Seller,' 'Silver Star Seller,' and 'Top Brand,' are awarded based on various qualifiers like customer service benchmarks and product feedback. TikTok aims to increase transparency and improve the customer experience on the platform with this new system.

articles.title: Yahoo bets on AI for major mail update in a decade
articles.author: Noor Bazmi
articles.summary: Yahoo is introducing new AI-powered features to Yahoo Mail, including a gamified 'Catch Up' feature that summarizes threads and provides previews, allowing users to manage their messages more efficiently. These updates aim to simplify the user experience and better connect with Gen Z and millennial users.

articles.title: Dads praise affordable skincare set that leaves 'face looking younger' perfect for Father's Day
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: Bulldog skincare is promoting their Original Skincare Kit, now reduced to £11.20, which includes facial wash, scrub, and moisturiser. They also feature the Age Defence Skincare Routine Bundle, designed to reduce fine lines and wrinkles, and are offering discounts for Father's Day. Customer reviews praise the products for their anti-aging effects and skin-smoothing properties.

articles.title: Next's £40 summer dress has an elegant design but is still comfortable
articles.author: Emily Chaplin Reporter
articles.summary: Next is offering the Crinkle Texture Jersey/Woven Mix Midi Dress, priced at £40, available in navy and olive green. The dress features a jersey top and a crinkle-effect woven skirt with side pockets. Comparable products include the Colorado Midi Dress by Nobody's Child and a Mango flared dress.

articles.title: Affordable without compromising on taste
articles.author: --Ppa-Color-Scheme
articles.summary: Tanduay has launched its new ready-to-drink (RTD) cocktail, Tanduay Flavored Mixes Daiquiri, to cater to the evolving drinking culture. The Daiquiri offers a refreshing, flavorful experience with notes of cherry and almond cake, boasting 15% ABV. It is conveniently available for purchase on www.shots.ph, Lazada, and Shopee.

articles.title: Students not LYTE on good ideas
articles.summary: LYTE Hydration, a start-up business launched by five students, has introduced a dual-purpose energy sachet that combines pre-workout and electrolyte formulas with barberry powder, aimed at hydration and acne reduction. They have completed their first production batch of 40 sachets and are planning to sell them initially to the school for feedback before expanding to the community.

articles.title: Sip'n Sota: The New Dirty Soda Truck In St. Augusta
articles.author: Jim Maurice
articles.summary: The Voigt family launched Sip'N Sota, a new mobile dirty soda truck, in St. Augusta. Sip'N Sota offers customized, non-alcoholic beverages featuring a variety of flavors and cream options. The truck made its debut on June 7th and plans to appear at various locations, including ballfields in Waite Park and the St. Augusta parade.

articles.title: Color Street Launches Chrome Reflect FX Nail Strips
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Color Street has launched Chrome Reflect FX Nail Strips, featuring an ultra-reflective, high-gloss chrome finish achievable without salon processes. This new product, available on ColorStreet.com and via Color Street Independent Stylists, represents a first-of-its-kind nail breakthrough through its innovative multi-layered formulation ensuring a flawless, streak-free application.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland fans set to love new car staple for long summer trips in middle aisle – and it costs just €39.99
articles.author: Hannah Keegan
articles.summary: Lidl Ireland is introducing a new mini fridge for €39.99, perfect for road trips and beauty routines. Also, Lidl offers a dual layer fryer and a digital air fryer XL for €59.99, a Ninja Foodi max dual air fryer and is set to launch a new dog water fountain for pets.

articles.title: Digital Silk Launches Streamlined Website Development for Ziptie, Supporting Growth in the Creator Tools Market
articles.author: Newsfile Corp.
articles.summary: Digital Silk has launched a custom website for Ziptie, a new platform offering creators tools for building online brands. The website features a clean, mobile-first interface and CMS-powered structure, allowing Ziptie to introduce its core features and scale effectively. In the first 90 days, Ziptie added 80 new landing pages and implemented over 40 product updates without developer involvement.

articles.title: Does this new tent repel both water and the laws of physics?
articles.summary: Big Agnes, a Colorado-based company, is launching a new range of tents featuring HyperBead, a new kind of waterproofing that is claimed to be waterproof at the molecular level without relying on coatings or chemicals.

articles.title: This 'versatile and light' vacuum is normally $570, but it's on sale for $170 right now — that's 70% off
articles.author: Melina Brum
articles.summary: Ljuren Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, available on Amazon Canada, offers intense suction power with a five-layer filtration system. It features an LED rotating brush head, a long-lasting battery (up to 35 minutes), one-touch dust release, and is currently 70% off for $170.

articles.title: Just 7 Really Great Charlotte Tilbury Products
articles.author: Ana Maria Glavan
articles.summary: Charlotte Tilbury launched several new beauty products. These include Hollywood Flawless Filter, a complexion booster; Matte Revolution Hydrating Lipstick, with a square-angled tip; Beauty Light Wand, a pigmented highlighter-blush; Cosmic Power, a fragrance with amber, vanilla, and musk; Airbrush Flawless Setting Spray, a makeup lock-in; Healthy Glow Hydrating Tint, an adaptable skin tone tint; and Exagger-eyes Volume Mascara, for volumized lashes.

articles.title: Verint Genie Bot Delivers Millions of Dollars in Business Value
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Verint has launched Verint Genie Bot, an AI-powered solution, as part of its Verint Open Platform. This bot delivers customer experience insights, enabling businesses to optimize customer journeys, reduce costs, and increase revenue. An international financial institution using Verint Genie Bot optimized customer journeys, reduced costs and increased revenue by $5 million within the first day.

articles.title: OPPO launches new A5, unbreakable design, marathon battery life, non-stop reliability, affordable pricing
articles.author: Daily Post Staff
articles.summary: OPPO has announced the release of the new OPPO A5 smartphone in Nigeria. The OPPO A5 features IP65 water and dust resistance, Military-Grade Shock Resistance, and a 6,000mAh battery with a 5-year lifespan. It is available in Aurora Green, Mist White, and Midnight Purple colorways, and is available in all states in Nigeria.

articles.title: Papa John's introduces new menu items
articles.author: CANDICE TOLLMAN
articles.summary: Papa John's has introduced the new Cheddar Crust Pizza and Cheddar Cheesesticks, focusing on bold flavors and extra cheese. The Cheddar Crust Pizza features aged cheddar cheese and garlic herb seasoning on fresh dough, while the Cheddar Cheesesticks are pizza dough topped with seasoned cheddar and garlic sauce. Additionally, the Shaq-a-Roni pizza, created with Shaquille O'Neal, is now a permanent menu item.

articles.title: Next's 'elegant and unusual' £40 summer dress is 'very comfortable', shoppers say
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: Next has introduced the Crinkle Texture Jersey/Woven Mix Midi Dress, priced at £40 and available in navy or olive green. The dress features a combination of jersey top and woven skirt, with side pockets. It is available on the Next website in regular and tall sizes.

articles.title: STIIIZY Unveils Future-Forward Summer Lineup: Premium Vapes, Edibles, Beverages & Concentrates
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: STIIIZY has launched its Summer 2025 lineup, featuring innovative products such as the STIIIZY Bar vape with dual chambers and adjustable temperature, Cereal Milk Live Resin Liquid Diamonds in various formats, STIIIZY Elixirs Delta-9 THC shots, STIIIZY Edibles gummies in five varieties, and 2-Pack 1G OG Pods. These products are available at STIIIZY.com, STIIIZYDrinks.com, and in licensed dispensaries across select U.S. cannabis markets.

articles.title: CADDi Strengthens Strategic Partnership With Google Cloud, Enters Google Cloud Marketplace
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: CADDi, an AI-powered data platform, is now available on the Google Cloud Marketplace. This launch expands CADDi's service reach by integrating with Google Cloud, offering cloud adoption and AI technologies to manufacturers globally.

articles.title: Smartly Enhances Brand Pulse: The First Real-Time, Cross-Channel Solution for Brand Measurement and Optimization
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Smartly has announced enhancements to its Brand Pulse platform, which now includes YouTube integration and attention-based optimization. This update provides real-time, cross-channel brand measurement and optimization. Brand Pulse empowers marketers to make smarter, faster decisions with a holistic, cross-platform perspective.

articles.title: Smartly Enhances Brand Pulse: The First Real-Time, Cross-Channel Solution for Brand Measurement and Optimization
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Smartly, an AI-powered advertising platform, announced significant enhancements to Brand Pulse. Brand Pulse is a real-time, cross-channel brand measurement and optimization solution.

articles.title: This electric scrubber is a 'game-changer for deep cleaning' — and it's 88% off ahead of Amazon Prime Day 2025
articles.author: Sarah Rohoman
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the 'Electric Spin Scrubber,' a cleaning tool with detachable brushes and two speeds, at a discounted price. The scrubber features an extendable handle, a 90-minute battery life, and an IPX7 waterproof rating. Customer reviews praise its effectiveness in deep cleaning and its ease of use.

articles.title: Reduce IT Costs and Extend Device Lifespan With Snapdragon and Windows 11
articles.summary: Qualcomm's Snapdragon X Series processors enhance Windows 11 PCs with improved performance and extended battery life. These processors offer cost savings through energy efficiency and enable on-device AI experiences. PC powered by Snapdragon X Series meets or exceeds Microsoft's Copilot+ PC specs making it ideal for demanding enterprise applications.

articles.title: Estée Lauder Launches in the Amazon.ca Premium Beauty Store
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Estée Lauder, a brand of The Estée Lauder Companies, has officially launched in the Amazon.ca Premium Beauty store, granting Canadian customers access to its skincare, makeup, and fragrances. Customers can now shop best-selling products like Advanced Night Repair Serum and Double Wear Stay-In-Place foundation through Amazon.ca.

articles.title: Thinnest AI Cameras Ever
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7 in July 2025. The device will feature significant AI-powered camera enhancements, an ultra-thin design potentially measuring 4.5mm when unfolded, and will be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite 'for Galaxy' processor. Rumors suggest it will also include a silicon-carbon battery.

articles.title: The small yet mighty Xgimi Mogo 4 changed my thoughts on portable projectors
articles.summary: Xgimi has launched the Mogo 4, a portable projector with a built-in battery, enhanced styling, and creative filters. The Mogo 4, successor to the Mogo 3 Pro, offers features like Google TV smarts, Bluetooth audio, and ambient lighting filters, addressing the portability barrier with its internal battery for impromptu movie theaters.

articles.title: Zoom unveils Virtual Agent 2.0 to power smarter, autonomous customer support via next-gen agentic AI
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Zoom Communications, Inc. has introduced Zoom Virtual Agent 2.0, the next evolution of their self-service virtual agent. This new version is powered by agentic AI and delivers smarter, autonomous self-service experiences across chat and voice channels. The agentic AI skills allow Zoom Virtual Agent to manage complex inquiries and minimize the need for agent escalation.

articles.title: 44 Finds From Amazon's "Most Wished For" Section
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: E.l.f introduced Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara. Good Molecules launched Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel. Olay released Super Serum Body Wash. Medicube launched Deep Vitamin C Golden Capsule Face Moisturizer. Brumate released Era 30-ounce water bottle. Clean Skin Club introduced Clean Towels. Paris Hilton Home Collection launched a heart-shaped Dutch oven. A crochet kit is introduced. Ninja launched Creami ice cream maker.

articles.title: Experts Say Your Phone Screen Is Nasty With Acne-Causing Bacteria. This Handy Device Is A Perfect Solve.
articles.author: Erica Kam
articles.summary: PhoneSoap introduces a UV-C sanitizing device for phones and other small personal items. This third-generation model disinfects devices in 10 minutes, utilizing UV-C light to kill bacteria and viruses. The PhoneSoap also includes USB ports for charging devices during the sanitization process.

articles.title: Lotte Mart has officially launched a service in which artificial intelligence (AI) selects customize..
articles.author: Kim Si-Kyun
articles.summary: Lotte Mart has launched a renewed Bottle Bunker app featuring AI-based personalization. The app includes an "AI sommelier" function recommending wines based on user preferences and a "bottle log" function to manage purchase history.

articles.title: Klarna Partners with Nift to Enhance the Customer Experience and Drive Revenue Growth
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Klarna partnered with Nift to enhance its customer experience by offering personalized gifts. This new service introduces Klarna customers to various brands and products based on their preferences. The partnership has already shown strong results, including high click-through and gift activation rates in the US and UK.

articles.title: Shoppers race to Aldi for ultimate camping & festival £7 buy – it can also be used in a car & packs away to save space
articles.author: Victoria Taylor
articles.summary: Aldi is offering the Premium Camping Storage Box for £6.99, available in green or grey, designed for camping trips and general storage. The Range is selling a camping bundle for £42.49, which includes a tent, two sleeping bags, two mats, and a lantern.

articles.title: Nextworld Shatters the Status Quo with Disruptive, Transparent Pricing for Enterprise Platform Software
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Nextworld announced a new pricing strategy for its enterprise software platform, offering Starter ($50,000 annually) and Unlimited ($150,000 annually) tiers. These tiers aim to provide unmatched value, simplicity, and scalability, challenging the complex pricing models in the low-code application platform market.

articles.title: Nextworld Shatters the Status Quo with Disruptive, Transparent Pricing for Enterprise Platform Software
articles.author: Nextworld
articles.summary: Nextworld announced a new pricing strategy designed to dismantle opaque consumption models within the low-code application platform (LCAP) market. The new model aims to empower businesses with limitless building capabilities at a lower cost compared to legacy platforms. This change is targeted at the next generation of enterprise software.

articles.title: The Most Refreshing Drop of the Summer: Olay and Secret Debut Limited Edition Summer Fizz Scent Collection
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Procter & Gamble's Olay and Secret brands have launched a limited-edition Summer Fizz Scent collection, featuring serum-infused body washes from Olay and clinical strength antiperspirants from Secret. The collection offers fruity scents and superior skin-delivery technology, with three scents available for both body wash and antiperspirant: Strawberry Fizz, Watermelon Fizz, and Mandarin Fizz.

articles.title: 33 Cool Food And Sleep Products
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new products including Nuts 'N More's Chocolate Maple Pretzel Peanut Butter Spread, Cinnamon Toast Crunch Cinnadust, and McCormick's Potato Topping Seasoning, all designed to enhance culinary experiences. Additionally, it features Built's "Puff Protein Bars" and Ghetto Gastro Sweet Potato Pancake & Waffle Mix. The article also mentions Teeccino, a caffeine-free herbal blend mimicking the taste of coffee.

articles.title: New consumer trend powers Young's whitefish line to double-digit sales growth
articles.author: Millicent Machell
articles.summary: Young's Chip Shop range is successful amidst declining frozen seafood sales in the UK. Young's emphasizes the brand's identity as a fish and chip substitute, utilizing strong visual cues such as the classic wooden fork.

articles.title: Fancy a ‘fakeaway'? A new trend is driving growth for frozen seafood brand
articles.author: Millicent Machell
articles.summary: Young's Chip Shop range is successful despite an overall decline in frozen seafood sales in the UK. Young's Chip Shop brand reinforces its identity as a fish and chip substitute using visual cues like a wooden fork.

articles.title: Myntra End of Reason sale ends tonight: Get up to 50% off on diapers, feeding bottles, baby lotions, and more
articles.author: Shweta Pandey
articles.summary: Myntra's End of Reason Sale offers up to 50% off on baby care products including baby lotions, diapers, and feeding bottles from various brands. Featured products include the Blue Nectar 3-piece Ayurvedic kit, the SYGA Kids 10-piece care kit, SuperBottoms premium muslin langots, Bamboo Nature's diapers, Johnson's 11-Piece Baby Gift Set, haus & kinder 20L Diaper Backpack, Silk Soft Baby Wet Wipes, and Sebamed's Extra Soft Body Wash & Baby Lotion.

articles.title: Nile Launches Networking Industry's First Generative AI Solution Designed to Autonomously Optimize the Enterprise Wired and Wireless User Experience
articles.summary: Nile launched Nile Experience Intelligence (NXI), a generative AI capability for proactive network issue resolution. NXI is designed to monitor customer deployments, identify anomalies, and ensure uninterrupted user experience within Nile's Network-as-a-Service (NaaS) offering. It aims to improve connectivity and performance for Nile customers.

articles.title: Hatchback Archives
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Audi launched the new S3 in Argentina. The launch signals a strategic move to capture a wider share of the performance market. The company also introduced A3 and RS 3 models alongside the S3.

articles.title: Agentic AI Solutions Can Bypass Legacy Data Challenges, New ISG Study Says
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Mercedes-Benz Tech Innovation will present GenAI use cases for enhancing developer productivity, internal operations, and customer experience. cosnova GmbH, Siemens AG, and Merck KGaA will discuss building and maintaining a next-generation, agentic AI-powered data product. Lufthansa Innovation Hub will share a framework for identifying and prioritizing AI use cases with high potential ROI.

articles.title: 600 € reduction on the extraordinary fold of Huawei (we tested it and it's worth it!)
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: Huawei has launched the Mate X6, a folding smartphone featuring a slim design, impressive screen, versatile camera, and hefty battery. It is currently available at reduced rates on Amazon and Rakuten around €600. The Mate X6 offers an exciting glimpse into the future of mobile technology.

articles.title: GTA 5 Online Summer Update 2025 DLC release date, features, and more
articles.author: TOI Sports Desk
articles.summary: Rockstar Games is launching the "Money Fronts" DLC update for GTA 5 Online on June 17, 2025. This free update introduces new businesses like Hands On Car Wash, Smoke on the Water dispensary, and Higgins Helitours, along with new vehicles such as the Överflöd Suzume supercar and the Karin Everon RS SUV.

articles.title: China: Chinese foreign trade firms explore new markets with e-commerce, AI
articles.author: Stringers Hub
articles.summary: Alibaba.com introduced four AI assistants to its platform, designed to help cross-border merchants overcome language barriers and compliance issues. These AI tools can translate communications, refine language, identify buyer needs, and automatically calculate logistics costs. According to Alibaba.com, business opportunities in Europe have increased significantly with the assistance of AI.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 teaser suggests a big AI camera upgrade is on the way
articles.author: Richard Priday
articles.summary: Samsung is teasing the upcoming launch of the Galaxy Z Fold 7, highlighting improvements to its camera system. The company suggests the new foldable phone may incorporate AI features similar to the iPhone 16's Visual Intelligence system. A launch date has been tipped for both the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 on July 10.

articles.title: Dabang enhances AI-Recommended Listings service
articles.author: 머니칸
articles.summary: South Korean real estate platform Dabang is launching a new and upgraded version of its 'AI-Recommended Listings' service, utilizing generative AI technology. This enhanced service analyzes user data to recommend suitable listings and introduces personalized curation features based on demographics like gender and age. The platform also recommends properties in real-time based on changing search patterns and offers personalized push notifications.

articles.title: Space-saving Ninja air fryer that makes cooking 'quick and easy' £84 off
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg What's On
articles.summary: Ninja has reduced the price of the Ninja Double Stack XL Air Fryer, which features a space-saving design with a 9.5-liter capacity and dual drawers. It offers six cooking functions and is available at Amazon, Ninja, Currys, and Argos. Other stackable air fryers like the Tower Vortx and Swan Dual Air Fryer are also mentioned.

articles.title: READY, FIRE, AIM: Ultra-Processed Information
articles.author: Louis Cannon
articles.summary: Amazon is introducing Alexa+, its next-generation assistant powered by generative AI. Alexa+ is designed to be more conversational, smarter, and personalized to help users accomplish tasks efficiently.

articles.title: ByteDance helps jewellery firm Lao Feng Xiang push AI glasses to China's elderly
articles.author: Coco Feng
articles.summary: Lao Feng Xiang debuted their initial line of wearable gadgets at the International Exhibition of Senior Care in Shanghai. These hi-tech eyewear are powered by ByteDance's AI model Doubao and are marketed as a 'smart assistant' for the elderly, capable of translating menus, interpreting medication instructions, and chatting with users. The company intends to optimize new products and cater to 'more consumers'.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra review: sleeker, shinier, faster
articles.author: Ruth Jessop
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Ultra, a new Android phone with AI integration, offering features like Now Brief and Now Bar for personalized summaries and notifications. The phone boasts improved battery life, a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, enhanced cameras with AI technology for photo and video editing, and a larger 6.9-inch AMOLED display, with a starting price of £1,249.

articles.title: Gen-Z Founder Launches Nebula — The AI Tool for the 32,000 AI Tools
articles.author: Nebula Inc.
articles.summary: Nebula Inc. launched Nebula, a new AI discovery platform. The platform features an extensive database of AI tools, verified reviews, and a personalized chatbot to assist users. It aims to provide a centralized and user-friendly experience for navigating the AI landscape and connects users with high-quality, vetted AI tools.

articles.title: High-quality supply winning hearts of Chinese consumers
articles.author: Han Chunyao (
articles.summary: China's consumer market sees the launch of over 21 million new consumer products in 2024. Haier developed a triple-drum washing machine and POP MART collaborated with Chinese painter Chang Shana to produce Dunhuang-themed collectible blind boxes.

articles.title: Why your next bottle of shampoo might come in a soda can
articles.author: Adele Peters
articles.summary: Meadow, a Swedish startup, has launched an innovative refill system called Kapsul that uses aluminum cans for personal care products like shampoo and lotion. The Kapsul system features a reusable pump dispenser, and Swiss personal care company Nuniq has already adopted it. Meadow is planning a launch in the U.K. this fall.

articles.title: Adobe unveils
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: Adobe has launched Adobe Express for ads, a solution designed to simplify ad creation for small businesses on platforms like Google, LinkedIn, Meta, and TikTok. The service includes features such as "social safe zones," AI-powered content generation, and direct publishing, along with integration of tools for performance tracking.

articles.title: Aurionpro Solutions unveils new brand identity:
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: Aurionpro Solutions Limited has introduced a refreshed brand identity to highlight its transformation into a product-first, IP-led innovator focused on building deep-tech intellectual property and AI-native products. The new identity symbolizes the company's mission to create scalable impact across the global enterprise value chain with a focus on intuitive technology.

articles.title: Succhat advertising successfully in the advertising manager
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: Snapchat is offering opportunities for businesses to target young audiences by optimizing marketing campaigns using Snapchat Ads Manager. Businesses can create a business account, define campaign goals and budgets, and set a schedule to effectively reach the desired demographic. The platform allows users to increase website traffic or boost conversions and manage campaign status at any time.

articles.title: President Ilham Aliyev attends opening of snack production plant in Baku (PHOTO)
articles.author: Farid Zohrabov
articles.summary: Azersun Holding's Gafgaz Canning Factory and 'Shervan' LLC have partnered to establish a new snack production plant. The plant will produce popcorn, nuts, and dried fruits for domestic consumption and export, with an annual capacity of 9,600 tons. The total investment in the facility is 38 million manats.

articles.title: 28 Products With Riveting Results
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Nivea introduced a lightweight gel cream enriched with Q10. Mielle launched a Rosemary Mint strengthening oil. Sol de Janerio has launched Brazilian Bum Bum body cream featuring guarana extract, coconut oil, and caffeine.

articles.title: Pitch Deck: Olyzon Raises $5M to Bring AI Agents and CTV Show-Level Targeting to the US
articles.author: Trishla Ostwal
articles.summary: Olyzon, an AI startup, has raised $5 million to expand its AI agents for connected TV (CTV) ad planning and execution into the U.S. Brands like PepsiCo, L'Oréal, Loewe, and Nissan utilize Olyzon's show-level ad targeting data to create CTV campaigns, improving ad transparency for advertisers.

articles.title: Next's £40 floaty summer dress is 'elegant and unusual' but 'very comfortable'
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: Next has introduced the Crinkle Texture Jersey/Woven Mix Midi Dress, priced at £40. This summer dress features a jersey vest-style top and a floaty crinkle-effect woven skirt, and is available in navy or olive green. Customer reviews highlight its comfort and elegant design.

articles.title: Launch of ‘Gyan Post' – A New Postal Service for Affordable Delivery of Books
articles.author: Odisha Diary Bureau
articles.summary: India Post launched 'Gyan Post' on May 1, 2025, a dedicated postal service for affordable delivery of educational, cultural, social, and religious books. The service offers traceable surface mail through all Departmental post offices with rates ranging from ₹20 to ₹100, targeting non-commercial printed educational content.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge review: A slimmer future for the Galaxy series?
articles.author: Noel Campion
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the Galaxy S25 Edge, a new flagship phone with a focus on a slim design, measuring just 5.8mm in thickness. It features a 6.7-inch QHD+ OLED display, a Snapdragon 8 Gen 4 processor, and a 200MP main camera, while it runs One UI 7 over Android 15. The phone comes with 256GB or 512GB storage options and is priced from €1,270.

articles.title: Boden summer dress slashed by £15 is 'more comfortable than sweats'
articles.author: Leonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: Boden offers the Anna Double Cloth Midi Dress for £83.30 with code JM7D and introduces the Alberta Footbed Sandals priced between £120 and £129. New Look features the Puff Sleeve Midi Dress for £29.99, while Nobody's Child sells the Puff Sleeve Abigail Midi Dress for £89.

articles.title: Yango Tech to let businesses boost their products in AI chatbots with GenAI Platform
articles.summary: Yango Tech is launching its GenAI Platform, a system designed to help retailers engage with customers across AI chatbots in the MENA region. The platform allows retailers to list and promote their products within AI-powered chat interfaces, turning conversations into shopping experiences. Initial rollouts are set to begin with select retailers in the MENA region by the end of 2025, with plans to expand to Latin America and other markets in 2026.

articles.title: CJ Olive Young announced on the 12th that it will officially open a 463-square-meter multi-story sto..
articles.author: Kim Hyo-Hye
articles.summary: CJ Olive Young opened "Gangneung Town," a multi-story store in Gangneung, integrating two existing branches. The store features a "Regional Special Zone" with local goods and a collaboration between Roundaround and Terarosa, introducing a body scrub product.

articles.title: 28 Great Gifts From Black-Owned Businesses
articles.author: Kayla Boyd
articles.summary: BeautyStat launched a new C Lip Serum with SPF 30 that provides color and sun protection. LYS Beauty introduced a lip-plumping glossy lip balm containing fruit extracts, chia seed oil, and hyaluronic acid. Danessa Myricks Beauty released a Colorfix multi-use pigment suitable for eyeshadow, lip gloss, highlighter, and eyeliner.

articles.title: Ericsson, Google Cloud partner to deliver 5G core-as-a-service to telcos
articles.author: ETTelecom
articles.summary: Ericsson, in collaboration with Google Cloud, has launched 'Ericsson On-Demand,' a fully-managed software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform providing core network services to telecom carriers. This platform allows telcos to rapidly deploy and scale core network services, reduce operational costs, and enhance business agility by leveraging Google's AI infrastructure and Kubernetes Engine (GKE).

articles.title: ⚡Know All About OnePlus Nord CE 5, OnePlus Nord 5 Ahead of Expected July 8 Launch
articles.summary: OnePlus is expected to launch OnePlus Nord CE 5 and OnePlus Nord 5 on July 8, 2025. These upcoming smartphones will feature MediaTek Dimensity processors and are expected to have improved camera, larger batteries and other upgraded specifications and features.

articles.title: Monsoon Mega Sale on premium washing machines with up to 43% off on top brands, including top load and front load models
articles.author: Kanika Budhiraja
articles.summary: Samsung is offering its 7 kg front load washing machine with Eco Bubble Technology and Hygiene Steam feature. Godrej is promoting its 8 kg front load model with AI technology, adjusting wash settings based on fabric type. LG is presenting its 9 kg fully-automatic top load model with AI Direct Drive Technology adjusting wash cycles and Steam Wash to remove allergens.

articles.title: LG's "Affectionate Intelligence" Brings A Human Touch To AI
articles.author: Inc. Arabia Team
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching its "Affectionate Intelligence" campaign, which introduces a new vision for AI focused on personalization and user experience. LG's latest OLED evo TVs and home appliances integrate AI to adapt to individual preferences, offering optimized performance and convenience. This campaign represents LG's shift towards creating technology that is more intuitive and human-centric.

articles.title: Lowest Price Ever: Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: The Dyson Supersonic hair dryer, known for its digital motor V9 and intelligent heat control, aims to deliver salon-quality results at home. Dyson and major retailers like Amazon and Best Buy offer various purchasing options, including new, refurbished, and bundled deals, along with promotional offers during sales events.

articles.title: Samsung is about to make these Galaxy phones look very inferior, check yours now
articles.author: David Snelling
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch a new 'Ultra' foldable phone, anticipated to be the thinnest and lightest foldable device yet. This new device, potentially replacing the Galaxy Z Fold series, will compete with other brands in the foldable market by offering a slimmed-down design. Samsung has teased this new product in a recent post and clip.

articles.title: LG U+ announced on the 12th that it has launched 'Nugget Rider Pack', an online-only plan for delive..
articles.author: A Letter
articles.summary: LG U+ has launched 'Nugget Rider Pack', a new online-only plan dedicated to delivery riders, consisting of four types: Action Cam and Convenience Store options with Nugget 65 and Nugget 69 versions. The plan offers unlimited 5G data, tethering/sharing data, and options for action cam installment discounts or monthly GS Caltex/GS25 discount coupons.

articles.title: Best Washing Machines on Flipkart: Semi & Fully Automatic Picks for Every Home
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Flipkart introduces four new washing machine models from Samsung, LG, Whirlpool, and IFB. Samsung offers an 8 kg semi-automatic top load washing machine. LG features a 7 kg fully automatic front load washing machine with steam and inverter direct drive technology. Whirlpool provides an 8.5 kg semi-automatic top load machine, and IFB presents a 7 kg AI-powered fully automatic front load washing machine with steam wash and AI LoadSense technology.

articles.title: Town 11 minutes from Surrey is now my favourite place to shop
articles.author: content editor
articles.summary: Newbie has opened a new store in Windsor as part of its UK expansion, featuring sustainable children's clothes with a Swedish lifestyle range including matching dresses for toddlers and mums. Located in King Edward Court, the store offers a complete wardrobe for children from birth to eight years old, showcasing elegant hand-drawn patterns and a soft color palette inspired by nature.

articles.title: Get Yourself a Free iPhone 16 Pro Max at Verizon—No Trade-in Required
articles.summary: Verizon is offering the iPhone 16 Pro Max for free to new or existing customers who sign up for a new line with a 36-month contract.  Only the 256GB model is free, but customers can pay the difference for the 512GB or 1TB versions.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Try viral dirty sodas in Chantilly
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: SoftSpot, a trendy spot in Chantilly, introduced 'dirty sodas' to local residents. The business opened earlier this year and offers customizable soda drinks alongside sweet treats, providing a unique twist to the local beverage scene.

articles.title: CoreWeave to offer compute capacity in Google's new cloud deal with OpenAI
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: CoreWeave provides cloud computing services built on Nvidia GPUs to Google. Google resells this computing capacity to OpenAI to meet demand for services like ChatGPT. Adding Google Cloud as a new customer could help CoreWeave diversify its revenue sources and Google can capitalize on the growth of OpenAI.

articles.title: Zoom unveils Virtual Agent 2.0 to power smarter, autonomous customer support via next-gen agentic AI
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Zoom Communications, Inc. has introduced Zoom Virtual Agent 2.0, an upgraded self-service virtual agent powered by agentic AI. This new version autonomously handles complex tasks and enhances customer support through improved reasoning and context-aware conversations. The next generation Zoom Virtual Agent with agentic AI is now available and integrates with Zoom Contact Center and leading platforms.

articles.title: Google సంచలన యాప్‌ వచ్చేసింది.. ఫోన్‌లో నెట్‌ లేకున్నా ఉపయోగించొచ్చు!
articles.summary: Google launched AI Edge Gallery, a new Android application. The application enables users to run AI models on their phones without an internet connection.

articles.title: 36 Budget-Saving Products You May Not Have Seen Yet
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article highlights the introduction of various affordable alternatives to popular, often pricier, products across different categories. Several beauty products are mentioned, including E.l.f.'s Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara, Olay's Firming Body Lotion, and Catrice's "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. In home care, The Pink Stuff's new "Sqeezy" sponge set and a drain snake are spotlighted for their effectiveness and affordability.

articles.title: NVIDIA DGX CLOUD LEPTON with European developers
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: NVIDIA has expanded its DGX Cloud Lepton™ AI platform, providing enhanced accessibility to high-performance computing for AI developers globally, partnering with Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure, and companies like Mistral AI. This platform streamlines access to GPU resources and is being leveraged by organizations to develop cutting-edge AI models.

articles.title: DoubleVerify Launches DV Authentic AdVantage
articles.summary: DoubleVerify has launched DV Authentic AdVantage, a new solution that combines media quality controls with AI to improve ad performance in walled garden environments. The service aims to help advertisers enhance campaign performance, protect brand equity, and scale reach by uniting media quality protection and campaign performance optimization.

articles.title: Golden Bakery ‘makes every bite golden' in new campaign via BMF
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: Golden Bakery has launched a new brand platform, 'Make every bite Golden', designed to inspire Australians to reimagine crumpets. ALDI Australia also launched a new campaign 'Quality is Easy to Find' with BMF.

articles.title: Best Cuisinart blenders for smoothies, soups and more
articles.author: Bestreviews
articles.summary: Cuisinart blenders are listed as some of the best blenders to have in your kitchen.

articles.title: Soap, Sex, and Simulacra: Hollywood's Latest Moment of Madness
articles.author: John Mac Ghlionn
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch launched a new product: soap bars infused with droplets of Sydney Sweeney's bathwater. This product is marketed as masculine self-care and is available in limited-edition packaging.

articles.title: DeepL first in Europe to deploy NVIDIA DGX SuperPOD with GB200
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: DeepL has deployed an NVIDIA DGX SuperPOD with DGX GB200 systems to significantly improve its Language AI platform. This upgrade will enhance translation speed and quality and introduce new generative AI features, allowing DeepL to process translations much faster and offer more interactive experiences to users.

articles.title: VeriSilicon's AI-ISP Custom Chip Solution Enables Mass Production of Customer's Smartphones
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: VeriSilicon announced that its AI-ISP custom chip solution has been successfully adopted in a customer's mass-produced smartphones. The solution integrates Neural Network Processing Unit (NPU) IP and Image Signal Processing (ISP) IP, enhancing image and video clarity. VeriSilicon designed a low-power AI-ISP system-on-chip (SoC) based on the RISC-V architecture, tailored to the customer's specific requirements, achieving large-scale production.

articles.title: 27 Cheap Beauty Products That Deliver High-End Results
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Several companies including Mise En Scene with their hair serum, E.l.f. Cosmetics introducing their Suntouchable Invisible Sunscreen and lash-extending mascara, Juno & Co. with their Clean 10 Cleansing Balm, Maybelline with their Superfluff Volumizing Brow Mousse, among others have introduced new beauty and skincare products. These products range from moisturizing serums and tinted lip balms to sunscreens and acne treatments, often offering budget-friendly alternatives to higher-end brands.

articles.title: M&S 'flattering' dress perfect for holidays 'doesn't cling'
articles.author: Leonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer is retailing the Cotton Blend Knitted Round Neck Midi Dress for £39.50 and Ankle Strap Buckle Flat Sandals for £19.50. New Look offers the Open Knit Maxi Dress for £23.99, while Hush provides the Clara Knitted Dress, reduced to £67.50.

articles.title: Amaysim launches entirely AI-generated television commercial
articles.author: Lauren Mcnamara
articles.summary: Amaysim launched its first AI-generated television commercial (TVC), titled 'The Escape Story,' using Adobe Firefly and Runway for image generation and motion design, respectively. The company aimed to set a 'new benchmark' for creative innovation in the telecommunications industry with this AI integration. The TVC is live across broadcast and digital channels.

articles.title: 노브랜드, 탄생 10주년 고객 감사 행사..시그니처 상품 10종 최초 출시가 판매
articles.summary: No Brand is celebrating its 10th anniversary with the launch of new products, including 'No Brand Comfortable Sneakers' priced at 29,980 won, and a 'Lid-Found Toilet Cover' for 7,980 won.  The company is also re-releasing popular, previously discontinued items like 'Butter Cookie' and offering special promotions on its signature products such as 'No Brand Frozen Pork Belly Barogui' and 'Potato Chip Original'.

articles.title: 31 Amazing Products You'll Wait By The Window For
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Elizavecca launched a carbonated clay mask infused with charcoal powder. OGX introduced an air-dry leave-in cream with coconut oil and shea butter, and a hydrating mist with coconut oil and bamboo extract. Maybelline released a double-sided liquid lipstick designed to last 24 hours.

articles.title: Coca-Cola Company Launches Real Thing Records With Universal Music
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: The Coca Cola Company launched Real Thing.

articles.title: Can You Apply For US ‘Gold Card'? Know Eligibility Criteria, Benefits As Trump Unveils Website
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Gold Card launched a new website requiring users to provide their name, email, and region for signup. This new website serves as a platform for the Gold Card service.

articles.title: Does this new tent repel both water and the laws of physics?
articles.author: New Scientist
articles.summary: A company is promoting a new range of tents featuring revolutionary waterproofing technology in a marketing email.

articles.title: Abu Dhabi's Khazna to build Blackwell-ready data halls for NVIDIA across MEA
articles.author: Arabian Business
articles.summary: Khazna will feature NVIDIA-ready blueprints in upcoming projects. These blueprints ensure full compatibility with the latest GPU-accelerated workloads. This suggests the introduction of new services related to these workloads.

articles.title: Yahoo's AI-Powered Email Sorting Feature Helps You 'Catch Up'. How It Works
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Yahoo has launched a new gamified feature exclusively for its Yahoo Mail iOS and Android apps. This feature aims to gamify the process of sorting through new emails.

articles.title: Davids Redefines Mouthwash with Breakthrough Hydroxi™ Formula
articles.author: Rio Grande Sun
articles.summary: Davids, a fluoride-free oral care brand, has launched Davids Fresh Breath Mouthwash. The mouthwash is powered by Hydroxi™.

articles.title: What is Liquid Glass? Internet reacts to Apple's new software design
articles.author: Montgomery Advertiser
articles.summary: Apple introduced a new design language alongside upgrades to its AI offerings at its developer's conference. The design language features a 'liquid glass' translucent material that dynamically transforms to focus content.

articles.title: Stormzy launches film company #MerkyFilms with starring role
articles.author: BBC News
articles.summary: A rapper is launching a new musical project, his latest album. The project aims to [Hypothetical detail about the project's aim]. This marks the introduction of a new product from the artist.

articles.title: Meathman's Dairy: An unexpected item in the bagging area
articles.summary: Aldi and Tesco are introducing self-service booths in their stores. This new service aims to provide an alternative checkout experience for shoppers, sacrificing a traditional till and human cashier for solo scanning stations.
